seo.whatIsTitle: What is AI Alt Text Generation?
seo.whatIsContent: **AI Alt Text Generation** uses **local AI vision** (Chrome Gemini Nano) to analyze images and generate **SEO-optimized alternative text** for accessibility and search engines. Alt text helps visually impaired users and improves image SEO.
seo.howToTitle: How to generate alt text with AI?
howToSteps: Optionally customize the **prompt** for specific focus
Click **'Generate Alt Text'** to analyze with local AI
Copy the **SEO-optimized description** for your website
seo.useCasesTitle: Use cases for AI alt text
useCases: Improve **image SEO** with keyword-rich alt text

faq.question: Is this tool free?
faq.answer: Yes! It uses **Chrome's local AI** (Gemini Nano) which is completely free and processes images **100% locally** without sending data to servers.

faq.question: What makes good alt text?
faq.answer: Good alt text is **descriptive, concise** (under 125 characters), includes **relevant keywords**, and describes the image's purpose in context.

faq.question: Does this work offline?
faq.answer: Yes! Once Chrome's AI model is downloaded, alt text generation works **completely offline** with no internet connection needed.
